text: Marvil Thomas "Tom" Shaw III, SSJE (August 28, 1945October 17, 2014) was an American Episcopal bishop. He was the fifteenth Bishop of Massachusetts. Shaw was born in Battle Creek, Michigan. Shaw died of brain cancer in West Newberry, Massachusetts, aged 69. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Deaths from brain cancer Category:People from Battle Creek, Michigan
title: Tom Shaw (bishop)
